The Shape
of
College

This project is an ever-evolving reflection on the college experience. Check out our most recent stories or the full list. If you like what you read, you may sign up to get an email when a new story comes out.

We welcome any questions, feedback, topic requests, and especially inquiries from potential contributors! Let us know what we are doing well or if something can be improved. Reach the team via email: hi (snail) theshapeofcollege (point) com.

To high school students: may you gain perspective from these stories. We hope they help you understand yourself, the world, and the college experience. We believe that perspective is the key to navigating admissions.

To parents: may you give your children space, to think and act and learn independently. We hope they will discover self-empowerment and identity ahead of schedule through your supportive love. We are all either wistful or grateful that we did.

To college students, professors, and the public: may we all learn from each other to be understanding and kind. We hope that these stories remind us to step outside of our own shoes and recall that life is not so narrow.

This project is dedicated to all our teachers.
